name: Fight Area
mapdesc:
A tiny port town where Trainers who love battling more than eating gather.{{sup/4|DP}}{{sup/8|BDSP}}
The gateway to the Battle Park is located here.{{sup/4|DP}}{{sup/8|BDSP}}
A tiny port city where Trainers who love battling more than eating gather.{{sup/4|Pt}}
The gateway to the Battle Frontier is located here.{{sup/4|Pt}}
Moored at the pier is the ferry to Snowpoint City.
